text: The 1955 Tour de Hongrie was the 16th edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 13 to 17 September 1955. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Győző Török. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1955 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 13 September | Budapest to Miskolc | | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text-align:right;" | 14 September | Miskolc to Debrecen | | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 15 September | Debrecen to Szeged | | |- ! scope="col" | 4 | style="text- align:right;" | 16 September | Szeged to Pécs | | |- ! scope="col" | 5 | style="text-align:right;" | 17 September | Pécs to Budapest | | |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="2" style="text- align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text- align:center;" | 1 | | Honvéd | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text- align:center;" | 2 | | Kinizsi | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 34" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | Dózsa | style="text-align:right;" | + 10' 32" |} |} ==References== 1955 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
title: 1955 Tour de Hongrie
